com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.http

Class OkHttpClientAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.http.AbstractHttpClientAdapter
      • com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.http.OkHttpClientAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpClientAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OkHttpClientWithCookieJarAdapter

    public class OkHttpClientAdapter
extends AbstractHttpClientAdapter
    A HttpClient built using OkHttp to send events via GET or POST requests.
